precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
action: Right Click on the desktop background.
expected_results: A context menu will appear with options such as "Arrange Icons By," "Refresh," "Paste," "New," and "Properties."

precondition: The Windows XP desktop context menu is visible with the 'Properties' option highlighted.
expected_results: The 'Display Properties' window will open and become the active window.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open. The "Screen Saver" tab is visible.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" tab will become active, displaying the screen saver settings.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the dropdown button labeled 'Screen saver'.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of available screen saver options with the currently selected option highlighted.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active. The 'Power...' button is located to the right of the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active. The 'Power...' button is visible in the 'Monitor power' section.
action: Click the 'Power...' button in the 'Monitor power' section.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open in front of the 'Display Properties' window.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Power Schemes" tab selected. The "Turn off monitor" option should have a dropdown menu visible.
action: Click the dropdown button next to the "Turn off monitor" setting.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of time options for the "Turn off monitor" setting.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open, the "Power Schemes" tab is selected, and the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the "Never" option in the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Never" option will be selected in the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu, indicating the monitor will no longer automatically turn off.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected.
action: Click the "OK" button at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close. The "Display Properties" window will become active and the "Screen Saver" tab will be visible.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active. The 'OK' button is visible at the bottom of the window.
